definition: Judicial Yuan, the high court under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]

sentences.english: Does the Justice Court interpreting Constitution possess such authority transforming contents of law?
sentences.chinese: 釋憲的司法院有無如此轉換法律內涵的權限？

sentences.english: The rules governing selection and temporary transfer for the position of Judge Assistant shall be determined by Judicial Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 法官助理之遴聘事項及借調辦法，由司法院定之。

definition: Executive Yuan, the executive branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
